 2013-03942013-04-18,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectGloria Rosenberg ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Alvin B. Rosenberg **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to GLORIA ROSENBERG, widow of the Hon. Alvin B. Rosenberg, Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective January 25, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
